Use a toothbrush and toothpaste to clean your teeth regularly.
Floss daily to remove plaque and bacteria from between your teeth.
Use mouthwash to kill bacteria and freshen your breath.
Practice good oral hygiene habits, such as avoiding sugary foods and drinks, to prevent tooth decay and gum disease.
Consider using alternative methods of cleaning, such as using a saltwater rinse or using a dental pick to clean between your teeth.
